welcome_benefits: Shoppers Stop Vouchers Worth ₹4,500 and Complimentary Shoppers Stop Black Membership (Worth ₹4,500)

Rewards Rate: 7% Reward Points/₹150 on Every SS Spends. 2% Reward Points/₹150 on Non-SS Spends
Reward Redemption: The points can be redeemed against the purchases made at the Shoppers Stop Outlet or through their official website.
Domestic Lounge Access: 16 complimentary lounge access at domestic airports (maximum 4 times in a quarter).
International Lounge Access: Complimentary Lounge Access at international airports - 8 times in a calendar year, maximum 2 times in a quarter
Insurance Benefits: Get accidental air death cover up to Rs. 3 crore, emergency overseas hospitalization for up to Rs. 50 lakh, and credit liability up to Rs. 9 lakh.

fees_charges.Rewards Redemption Fee: ₹50 for Cash Redemption and ₹99 for Other Reward Redemptions
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: Fuel surcharge waiver of 1%, maximum up-to Rs. 500 per statement cycle, at all the petrol pumps across India
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of amount withdrawn or Rs. 500 whichever is higher

product_details: Get 7% Reward Points on every SS spends. Maximum cap at 2,000 Reward Points per month
2% Reward Points on Non-SS spends. Maximum cap at 2,000 Reward Points per month
Complimentary access to the domestic lounge and international lounge.
